item.title: Luscious Strawberry Glazed Cheesecake Supreme
item.description: Ingredients Crust Ingredients 1 cup flour 1/4 cup sugar 1 tsp grated lemon peel 1/4 tsp vanilla 1 slightly beaten egg yolk 1/2 cup butter Filling Ingredients 3 well beaten eggs 2 8-ounce packages of cream cheese, softened 1 cup sugar 2 tsp vanilla 1/2 tsp almond extract 1/4 tsp salt 3 cups sour cream Glaze Ingredients 2 cups of fresh strawberries 3/4 cup water 2 tbsp cornstarch 1/2 cup sugar Directions Crust Directions Mix flour, sugar, lemon peel Cut in butter until crumbly Add 1 beaten egg yolk and 1/4 tsp vanilla, Mix Welland Pat 1/3 of dough on bottom of 9" spring form pan with sides removed Bake at 400 degrees for 8 mins Cool Pat remaining dough on sides Filling Directions Mix eggs, cream cheese, sugar, vanilla, almond extract, and salt Beat til smooth Blend in sour cream Pour into crust Bake at 375 degrees for almost 1 hour Cool and chill for 4-5 hours Glaze Directions Crust 1 cup of strawberries Add water and cook 2 mins Sieve Mix cornstarch with 1/2 cup sugar Slowly stir in heat berry mixture Bring to a boil, stirring constantly Cook or stir til mixture is thick and clear Cool to room temperature Halve remaining strawberries and place atop cake Pour glaze onto cake Chill 2 hours Enjoy!
